## Classes

### <a name="profile_hosts"></a>`profile_hosts`

configure /etc/hosts entries

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_hosts
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_hosts` class:

* [`hosts`](#hosts)

##### <a name="hosts"></a>`hosts`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of hosts entries that contain all the parameters that the
Puppet hosts resource can use.
See README.md for example hiera data.
